world looks for timely, accurate news about the novel coronavirus, how can

metadata.title: Recommended newsletters for journalists
metadata.description: Given how important newsletters have become to journalism in recent years, it’s no surprise that there are a proliferating number of newsletters about journalism. I subscribe to many of them for obvious reasons, and the ones listed below are a personal set of recommendations — these are the ones I p…

metadata.title: Social Video Resources
metadata.description:
This is a new version of my training notes. Rather than the usual PDFs and
eBooks I create, I’ve built this as a series of webpages that I can continually
update. This field is changing so fast that just putting up a set of static
files will render them obsolete too quickly. So, please bookmark thi…
